title: Bug 13620: Java Source Attachment Preference Page Text Alignment Issue
description: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page displays excessive white space, affecting the overall layout.
OB: The text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page is not aligned properly, resulting in a large amount of white space between the text and the top of the page.
EB: The text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page should be aligned at the top, consistent with the layout of other elements on the page.
SR:
1. Open the Java Source Attachment Preference Page.
2. Observe the excessive white space between the text and the top of the page.
